inputs.prompt: @a(red-haired woman in elegant attire) sits on a fallen log in the muted green forest, her hands clasped gently. @b(aged robot with weathered white-grey body) stands before her, its arms still extended in an open gesture. The woman looks up at the robot's glowing orange eyes, a gentle smile forming. The robot speaks in a whisper-soft, almost human-like voice with minimal mechanical resonance—quiet and intimate, as if sharing a secret. The woman responds in a soft, contemplative tone. Camera circles around them in a slow arc, revealing the depth of the forest behind. Natural forest ambience at low volume: soft wind through leaves, occasional bird songs. The robot's internal mechanisms are nearly silent, only a faint, rhythmic hum.
